{"step_by_step_thinking": "The olfactory receptors are located in the olfactory epithelium, which is a small patch of tissue at the back of the nasal cavity. This is mentioned in Document 3. The olfactory epithelium is located on the superior part of the nasal cavity, as stated in Document 16.
